--- title: Website Blocker keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This is the core functionality of beproductive. A defined list of websites is added to the `hosts` file of the OS with a redirect to `127.0.0.1`." description: "This is the core functionality of beproductive. A defined list of websites is added to the `hosts` file of the OS with a redirect to `127.0.0.1`." nb_path: "01_blocker.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Blocker[source]

Blocker(redirect='127.0.0.1')

The core of the package. It modifies the hosts file of the OS.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Blocker.block[source]

Blocker.block(notify=False)

Blocks all specified websites by replacing hosts file with hosts.blocked

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Blocker.unblock[source]

Blocker.unblock(notify=False)

Unblocks all websites by restoring the original hosts file

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Blocker.notify[source]

Blocker.notify(message, title='Website Blocker', duration=5)

Sends notification to CLI and - if available - to GUI

{% endraw %}

Using Blocker

{% raw %} 
import filecmp
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
blocker = Blocker()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert filecmp.cmp(host_fp, host_fp_copy) == True, "hosts file should be identical to hosts.original"
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
blocker.block()

'Websites blocked'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert filecmp.cmp(host_fp, host_fp_blocked) == True, "hosts file should be identical to hosts.blocked"
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
blocker.unblock()

'Websites unblocked'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert filecmp.cmp(host_fp, host_fp_copy) == True, "hosts file should be identical to hosts.original"
{% endraw %}

Command line tool

Standalone CLI. Made obsolete by the beproductive module.

{% raw %} 
Run blocker.py with arguments BLOCK or UNBLOCK
{% endraw %}
